channel.title: Login welcome message
channel.description:
Hi.
When you log into your server and it says "welcome to whateverscape" in the chat box... how do i edit that because i can't find it in cliebt.java, only the mainHelpMenu's.
thanks.

item.dc:creator: @I_Bugged_I I Bugged I
item.description:
@I_Bugged_I wrote:

lol wow found this account i had from 2007 wtf is this i don’t even remember changing welcome message from client rofl

@Hiaburi wrote:

if its testscape try searching //openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, (127 << 24)+1, misc.random(10)); it should be some were near that

item.title: Login welcome message
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

If ‘Testscape’ isn’t in the welcome message, then why search it? It’s common sense just to observe what the message says when you actually login, then search for it in client.Java.

Read full topic

item.description:
@joshsilly wrote:

ok, sorry that I cannot help you. I have used many sources, my favourite, and my current source for my current server is SvenScap3pk.

I really do like this source, and reccomend it to many people.

Joshsilly

item.dc:creator: @I_Bugged_I I Bugged I

item.title: Login welcome message
item.dc:creator: @joshsilly joshsilly
item.description:
@joshsilly wrote:

i will take a quick look through my client and tell u what code to look for… i will edit this post in a sec if u dont post,

i dont wanna get done fore double posting

here look for this,

if (logcount == 0)

look down that short bit and find the playhandler.messagetoall. that will be where it says it to all players

Just under that is this code…

if(playerRights < 1) { sendMessage("

This sends the player the message in the chat box when they logg in

Joshsilly

Read full topic
